body: Technically spoken this isn't amputee, as Motokos real body only consists out of her brain. Her cyborg body isn't fully operational and missing some pieces. So that would mean, that the right tag would me "missing" or "defective". Should be quite some joy to create new tags in the upcoming decades, than humanity enters the cyberpunk age, giving rise to cyberpunk-hentai with all of its madness.
So recently, Ankoman dwells into nipple fuckings and preggo amputees eh? As if pulling floppy grandmas titties while fucking breadstick dicks wasn't enough...
